main.title: Mixelate | Help Menu
main.description:
```For any other questions, please navigate to the quick support or create ticket channel.```
Select one of the buttons below to view the designated commands for each section!

client.title: Mixelate | Base Commands
client.description:
`/help` - Shows this message.

`/profile view <@user>` - View a freelancers profile.

`/ticket transcript` - Generate a transcript for your ticket.

`/wallet withdraw <amount>` - Withdraw funds from your wallet.
`/wallet spendings` - View all your spendings to Mixelate!
`/wallet earnings` - View all your earnings from Mixelate!
`/wallet balance` - View your current balance!
`/wallet calculate <amount>` - Calculates payment after PP and Mixelate Fees!

freelancer.title: Mixelate | Freelancer Commands
freelancer.description:
`/profile set <section> <value>` - Set or update a section on your profile.
Sections: `About Me`, `Portfolio`, `Timezone`, `Email`, `PayPal.Me`, `Pronouns`

`/ticket leave` - Leave and repost ticket to be claimed by a different freelancer.

staff.title: Mixelate | Staff Commands
staff.description:
**Commission Managers**
`/ticket repost` - Reposts a ticket to be re-claimed by a different freelancer.
`/ticket addcharge <amount>` - Creates an additional invoice.
`/ticket newprice <amount>` - Set the new price of a commission.
`/ticket begin` -Begin the commission process.
`/ticket invite <@user>` - Add an additional user to a ticket.
`/ticket close <time>` - Close a ticket after the specified duration.
`/ticket complete` - Complete the commission and send additional resources.
*Note: This will close the ticket after 48hrs along with review and tip prompt.*

**Application Reviewer**
`/ticket accept` - Accept an application and apply appropriate roles.
`/ticket deny` - Deny an application.

role.title: Select the relevant service below.
role.description: Ping the role of the service you would like to order.
